mapper.insert: insert into auction(auction_no, auction_name, auction_group, start_date, end_date, auction_up, auction_down, auction_unit, auction_area, auction_content, auction_title_img, auction_regdate ) values(auction_no.nextval, #{auction_name}, #{auction_group}, to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{auction_up}, #{auction_down}, #{auction_unit}, #{auction_area}, #{auction_content}, #{auction_title_img}, to_date(sysdate) )
mapper.select: select auction_no, auction_name, auction_up, auction_down, auction_title_img from auction
mapper.insert: insert into rt_auction(rt_auction_no, rt_auction_name, rt_auction_group, rt_auction_date, rt_auction_down, rt_auction_unit, rt_auction_area, rt_auction_content, rt_auction_title_img, rt_auction_regdate ) values(#{rt_auction_no}, #{rt_auction_name}, #{rt_auction_group}, to_date(#{rt_auction_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{rt_auction_down}, #{rt_auction_unit}, #{rt_auction_area}, #{rt_auction_content}, #{rt_auction_title_img}, to_date(sysdate) )
mapper.select: select rt_auction_no, rt_auction_name, rt_auction_down, rt_auction_title_img from rt_auction
